mapper.insert: insert into teamhonor (honor_sid, honor_title,honor_picture, honor_time, honor_type, honor_timesstamp, honor_introduce, honor_note) values (#{honorSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{honorTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{honorPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{honorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{honorType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{honorTimesstamp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{honorIntroduce,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{honorNote,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select honor_sid, honor_title, honor_picture, honor_time, honor_type, honor_timesstamp, honor_introduce, honor_note from teamhonor where honor_sid = #{honorSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select honor_sid, honor_title, honor_picture, honor_time, honor_type, honor_timesstamp, honor_introduce, honor_note from teamhonor
select count(honor_sid) from teamhonor WHERE honor_type = #{0};
select honor_sid, honor_title, honor_picture, honor_time, honor_type, honor_timesstamp, honor_introduce, honor_note from teamhonor where honor_type=#{0} ORDER BY honor_sid DESC LIMIT #{1},#{2};
select honor_sid, honor_title, honor_picture, honor_time, honor_type, honor_timesstamp, honor_introduce, honor_note from teamhonor where honor_sid=#{0};
